profile.name: Mohtasim Hadi Rafi
profile.title: Graduate Research Assistant
profile.bio:
I’m a researcher and engineer currently pursuing my Master’s in Biosystems Engineering at Auburn University. My work focuses on the intersection of AI, machine learning, and computer vision, with an emphasis on applying these technologies to biosystems.

 I love to read books (from literature to quantum mechanics...everything!) I'm an author of one original novel and multiple translation works.
